channel.title: Attack Timers

item.title: Attack Timers
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Im usin Devo 7 and i was wondering how i make the attack timers work. Right now i have the timers set up, but

  1. Everytime you click on the NPC you’ll hit, so you can hit about 100 in a second
  2. Attacking has not patttern its random
    3.i have a getbattletimers, i made a code like: actionInterval = getbattleTimer();

Here is the timer i have:

		if (System.currentTimeMillis() - offTimer > 2000){
			hitID = 0;
		}

Im just confused i don’t know how to fix, add my MSN lesterknome@live.com if you need more info

Read full topic
